name: Make-A-Group
description:
This game is still in developpement, so feedback is highly appreciated ^^

Make-A-Group is a 2D RPG where you play as R:E, a teenager who wishs to create his own music band, and follow his journey to make his dreams come true.

Made with Godot 3.4.2

CONTROLS :

- Arrows/WASD Keys : Movement

-P : Interaction

Play the game on Newgrounds : https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/vie... 

Follow the development on Twitter : https://twitter.com/ReiiMouse
